message: This is a high-quality product. It is the first one I'm offering, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. If you're interested, please let me know. If not, I'll move on to the next one.
I'll take it!

I'm glad you liked the first one! However, I want to be transparent with you. The first product was a great deal, and I'm not sure if you'll be as satisfied with this one. The price remains the same, $10000. But I'm willing to offer you a 'no-questions-asked' return policy for this product. If you're not happy with it, you can return it, and we'll part ways. What do you think?
I'll take it! The return policy is a nice touch, thank you!

I'm glad you appreciated the return policy! However, I want to let you know that I'm starting to get a bit concerned about the quality of the products I have left. Two low-quality products in a row is unusual, and I'm starting to wonder if there's something going on with this batch. I'm still willing to sell this one to you for $10000, but I want to offer you a 'quality guarantee'. If you buy this product and it's not up to your standards, I'll give you a $2000 discount on the next product you buy from me. What do you think?
I'm not convinced by the quality guarantee. I'd rather wait and see what the next product is like before making a decision.

I completely understand your decision to wait and see. I want to assure you that this next product is definitely high-quality, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it. Given the previous two low-quality products, I'm willing to offer you a special deal on this one. I'll sell it to you for $9000, which is a $1000 discount from the usual price. This is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure how long it will last. What do you think?
I'll take the discounted price! I'm hoping this one is high-quality.

I'm glad you took advantage of the discount! I'm happy to report that this next product is also high-quality. Given that we've had two high-quality products in a row, I'm starting to think that the previous two low-quality products were just anomalies. I'm willing to sell this one to you at the full price of $10000, but I'll throw in an additional bonus: if you buy this product, I'll give you a free inspection of the next product before you buy it. You can see for yourself whether it's high-quality or not. What do you think?
I'll take it! The free inspection of the next product is a great offer.

I'm glad you liked the previous offer! As promised, I'll give you a free inspection of this next product. However, I want to warn you that it's a high-quality product, and I'm not sure if you'll be able to resist the temptation to buy it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000, but I'll also give you a 'buy-it-now' option: if you're interested in buying this product immediately, I'll give you an additional 5% discount, making it $9500. If you decide to wait and inspect the next product, the price will be the same, but you won't get the discount. What do you think?
I'll take the 'buy-it-now' option and get the 5% discount. $9500 is a good price for a high-quality product.

I'm glad you took advantage of the 'buy-it-now' option! You're really getting a great deal on these high-quality products. However, I want to make sure you know that I'm not trying to take advantage of you. I'm confident that this next product is also high-quality, and I'm willing to put my money where my mouth is. I'll give you a 'price match guarantee': if you buy this product and then find a better deal on a high-quality product from someone else, I'll match that price. What do you think?
I appreciate the price match guarantee! I'll take the risk and buy the product.

I'm glad you're feeling confident! Given that you've bought three high-quality products in a row, I'm starting to think that you're a savvy buyer who knows a good deal when you see one. I'll make you a special offer: I'll sell this next product to you for $9000, which is a $1000 discount from the usual price. But here's the twist: I'll also give you a 'priority access' to the next product. If you buy this one, you'll get to see the next product first, before anyone else. What do you think?
I'll take the discounted price and the priority access to the next product. It's a great deal!

I'm glad you liked the deal! However, I have to admit that I'm a bit surprised that this next product is not high-quality. I thought we were on a roll! I want to make it up to you, so I'll offer you a'make-good' deal. I'll sell this product to you for $5000, which is a $5000 discount from the usual price. I'll also give you a 'get-out-of-one-buy' voucher, which you can use on the next product. If you don't like it, you can return it and not have to buy the next one. What do you think?
I'll take the discounted price and the 'get-out-of-one-buy' voucher. It's a good deal, considering the circumstances.

I'm glad you took advantage of the make-good deal! However, I have to admit that I'm starting to worry about the quality of my products. Two low-quality products in a row is not what I want to see. If you buy this product and it's not to your liking, I'll replace it with a brand new, high-quality product, free of charge. What do you think?
I appreciate the honesty and the offer, but I'm not going to take the risk. I'll wait and see what the next product is like before making a decision.

I'll take the final-chance deal. I'm hoping this one is high-quality, and the no-strings-attached return policy gives me peace of mind.

I appreciate the offer, but I think I've had enough low-quality products. I'm going to pass on this one.

I'll give you a full refund for this product, and I'll also give you a $10000 credit towards any future purchases you make from me. I know this isn't a product, but I hope it shows my commitment to making things right. Thank you for your patience and understanding throughout this process.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your commitment to making things right. I think I've had enough, and I'm just going to take the refund and the credit. Thank you for the experience.

I completely understand, Bob. I'm glad we could come to a mutually agreeable solution. As it turns out, this final product is actually high-quality. I'm going to leave it here for you, and I hope you'll consider it a parting gift.
